attributes.action: staff in the care industry have to be forced to have covid vaccinations
attributes.additional_details: It is against Human Rights of an individual choice. These same people have held things together while the country worked from home
attributes.background: Not make covid vaccination mandatory for care staff

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition we have open on the topic:

Do not require health and social care workers to take covid-19 vaccination
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842
